tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız şiir okuyarak, şiir yazılamayacağını anlatmak istedim ona.

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim aklın şiiridir; şiir de yüreğin bilimidir.

tr_quotes.quote: Manası anlaşılabilen şiir, gerçek şiir değildir.

tr_quotes.quote: Şiir, büyük zekaların rüyalarıdır.

tr_quotes.quote: Şiir tek kişilik bir zevktir, yalnızlığın sanatıdır.

tr_quotes.quote: Şiir, bir köpük kadar yeni, bir kaya kadar eskidir.

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan annesi için şiir yazmalı; hiç değilse hayatında bir kez.

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı yarım işleri artık tamamlıyorum. Bazı yarım şiirleri, bazı yarım baş ağrılarıyla.

tr_quotes.quote: Şiir öyle bir dildir ki başka hiçbir dile çevrilemez. Hatta yazılmış göründüğü dile bile.

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bana bir şiir kadar yakından ama acı sonla biten bir roman kadar uzak.

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan daha var, çok şükür, evde. Nefes var, ayak sesi var; çok şükür, çok şükür.

en_quotes.quote: I like poems that are little games

en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Never contend with a man who has nothing to lose
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: It seems to me that election season is just a Petri dish for anger and cynicism
en_quotes.author: Max Lucado

en_quotes.quote: Indulge not thyself in the passion of anger; it is whetting a sword to wound thine own breast, or murder thy friend
en_quotes.author: Akhenaton

en_quotes.quote: Whoever incites anger has a strong insurance against indifference
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: An angry people cannot create anything that is not imbued with anger
en_quotes.author: John McAfee

en_quotes.quote: One of man's greatest obligations is anger
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: My job is to show my clients that their anger is rarely someone else's fault. It's their flaw
en_quotes.author: Marshall Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: I don't think your ability to fight has anything to do with how big you are. It's to do with how much anger is in you

en_quotes.quote: I don't like anybody to be angry with me. I'd rather have friends
en_quotes.author: B. B. King

en_quotes.quote: I am a danger to myself if I get angry
en_quotes.author: Oriana Fallaci

en_quotes.quote: Never go to bed angry, stay up and fight

en_quotes.quote: I accrued anger from people's low opinion of me and my work, and for the work I might be capable of
en_quotes.author: Harrison Ford

en_quotes.quote: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance
en_quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

en_quotes.quote: An angry man is again angry with himself when he returns to reason

en_quotes.quote: The bare recollection of anger kindles anger

en_quotes.quote: Allowing children to show their guilt, show their grief, show their anger, takes the sting out of the situation
en_quotes.author: Martha Beck

en_quotes.quote: Anger elicits anger, fear elicits fear, no matter how well meaning we may be
en_quotes.author: Martha Beck

en_quotes.quote: To rule one's anger is well; to prevent it is better
en_quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

en_quotes.quote: Somebody hits me, I'm going to hit him back. Even if it does look like he hasn't eaten in a while
en_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

en_quotes.quote: My passion and energy get mistaken for anger
en_quotes.author: Gary Oldman

en_quotes.quote: Anger has a way of seeping into every other emotion and planting itself in there
en_quotes.author: Dane Cook

en_quotes.quote: I'm motivated by a bottomless well of anger. It's a joke, but I don't think I don't mean it
en_quotes.author: Jon Lovett

en_quotes.quote: All through life I've harbored anger rather than expressed it at the moment
en_quotes.author: Jessica Lange

en_quotes.quote: I'm very much aware of the dangers of becoming a cliche. Mr. Anger, someone who gets meaner, angrier on record
en_quotes.author: Trent Reznor

en_quotes.quote: When anyone arouses my anger, I will immediately pray for them and regain my peace of soul
en_quotes.author: Mother Angelica

en_quotes.quote: You reclaim your power by loving what you were once taught to hate
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: Anger is a good motivator
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: It is typical of women to fester and ferment over disappointments, slights, annoyances, angers, etc
en_quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

en_quotes.quote: He took over anger to intimidate subordinates, and in time anger took over him
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: He best keeps from anger who remembers that God is always looking upon him
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: The most powerful force in American politics is not anger, it's nostalgia

en_quotes.quote: My father was often angry when I was most like him
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: He that will be angry for anything will be angry for nothing

en_quotes.quote: As Christians, we sin with anger because we lack faith in God's ability to provide for or protect us

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot of anger about my childhood - being hard of hearing and my relationship with my father

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of anger in the Twitter-verse, as I've discovered. But there's a lot of love

en_quotes.quote: As you get older, you see the world at a different angle, maybe more cynically, but I just bury my anger

en_quotes.quote: My whole life, people have been saying, Why are you so angry?

en_quotes.quote: It really shocked me just to hear of the fans' response to 'St. Anger' not having guitar solos

en_quotes.quote: I'm not someone who feels anger on particular issues
en_quotes.author: Theresa May

en_quotes.quote: The anger of lovers renews their love
en_quotes.author: Terence

en_quotes.quote: Anger is a transient hatred; or at least very like it

en_quotes.quote: I think anger is a good thing

en_quotes.quote: What the media misses is the amount of anger that's out there. Trump didn't create that

en_quotes.quote: My humour has always come from anger, but I have to make sure I don't just get angry and jump on a soapbox

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that football sometimes was an outlet. It was a way for me to release anger, release frustration

en_quotes.quote: Yes, I was a bully. But the scrapping on the streets was my way of dealing with the anger I felt towards my parents

en_quotes.quote: I guess I probably make violent films partly because I can't express my anger in my real life very well

en_quotes.quote: I had a lot of anger inside me and that came out at times that were not particularly advantageous to me career-wise

en_quotes.quote: With Thobbing Gristle, that era from '75 to '81 was a period when the politics of the time demanded anger and rage

en_quotes.quote: Yeah, to me, acting is very therapeutic. I get out a lot of anger and frustration

en_quotes.quote: You see all the movies where people say, 'Don't fight out of anger'? They say that for a reason

en_quotes.quote: Anger is an expensive luxury in which only men of certain income can indulge

en_quotes.quote: Anger is an emotion, not a compass

en_quotes.quote: To the Left, Islam's anger and hatred of the West is understandable because they have legitimate grievances against us
en_quotes.author: Tom Tancredo

en_quotes.quote: Public anger over bank bailouts was as much about fairness as the billions of dollars spent
en_quotes.author: Nina Easton

en_quotes.quote: Anger is never without an argument, but seldom with a good one
en_quotes.author: George Savile

en_quotes.quote: When you're not sure your anger is justified, the thing to do is ask yourself exactly where it's coming from
en_quotes.author: Lynn Coady

en_quotes.quote: Fear usually looks like anger

en_quotes.quote: When you learn that a truth is a lie, anger follows
en_quotes.author: Grace Slick

en_quotes.quote: People are unjust to anger - it can be enlivening and a lot of fun

en_quotes.quote: When a man is wrong and won't admit it, he always gets angry
en_quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

en_quotes.quote: You can survive with anger, but you can't live with it forever

en_quotes.quote: Yogis have human emotions, but the thing is not to let anger and doubt become an obsession
en_quotes.author: Donovan

en_quotes.quote: When liberals dismiss all Trump supporters as racists, this only fuels their anger

en_quotes.quote: I am not deaf. I hear the anger. I see the dissatisfaction, and I have to go faster

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to go on stage with anger. And that's why I worked so hard to look within and change myself and evolve

en_quotes.quote: An angry player can't argue with the back of an umpire who is walking away
en_quotes.author: Bill Klem

en_quotes.quote: Relationships based on deals between leaders or ruling elites tend to collapse amid popular anger

en_quotes.quote: I've got a powerful left hook and a lot of intensity. The intensity comes from the anger within

en_quotes.quote: We have to take our anger and rage and channel it into building, growing, loving, holding each other up

en_quotes.quote: I've never felt that anger is a very powerful emotion

en_quotes.quote: When terrorism strikes, divisive anger is a natural response
en_quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

en_quotes.quote: Eventually, I moved from a place of anger toward the Jews of Israel toward a place of embrace

en_quotes.quote: I suppose there's an anger in all of us. Some hidden rage that you keep at bay
en_quotes.author: Dominic Cooper

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes we equate anger to destructive physical violence, but anger need not be martial
en_quotes.author: Kamal Haasan

en_quotes.quote: Anger is evil
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Men with anger do not know how to deal with unreasonable, pushy people, particularly women
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Peterson

en_quotes.quote: We need all races of men, and decent women, to stand up for what's right, drop anger, and live upright
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Peterson

en_quotes.quote: My tastes lean toward the more negative, angry and eclectic
en_quotes.author: Josh Silver

en_quotes.quote: I played on anger for the first 15 years of my career
en_quotes.author: Craig Bellamy

en_quotes.quote: The thing that started the peace movement in Ireland was anger - my anger. It wasn't anger; it was fury

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you just need to raise your voice. And sometimes a little anger is necessary, to be honest
en_quotes.author: Corey Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: Expressing anger is a form of public littering

en_quotes.quote: I've spent a lot of time and money trying to keep my anger in control

en_quotes.quote: So many women keep their anger inside and let it build until they explode and then people blow them off again
en_quotes.author: Rosalind Wiseman

en_quotes.quote: I do have anger management issues. Not clinical. Probably no more than most people

en_quotes.quote: Anger is so constructive

en_quotes.quote: I want to express myself to feel that what I feel is real. My joy, my pain, my anger

en_quotes.quote: Hizb ut-Tahrir spearheaded the radicalization of the 1990s and cultivated an atmosphere of anger

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if it's a male thing, but a lot of our emotions end up manifesting themselves in the form of anger
en_quotes.author: Sami Zayn

en_quotes.quote: I do think anger is so difficult for women. Girls think it undermines their femininity; it's not very ladylike

en_quotes.quote: I think, for one, we have to really accept that anger is a normal human emotion that can be a positive force for change

en_quotes.quote: When you started looking at the life of Tolstoy, there was so much passion and anger and drama surrounding him
en_quotes.author: Elif Batuman

en_quotes.quote: When you fight, anger drives up testosterone in both men and women

en_quotes.quote: I think I have more humour in me than anger. But those two things are great bed-fellows, performance-wise

en_quotes.quote: A little anger is a good thing if it isn't on your own behalf, if it's for others deserving of your anger, your empathy

en_quotes.quote: What's often not acknowledged about depression is how much anger is in it

en_quotes.quote: Every progressive movement has been built on the anger, needs, and aspirations of the emerging major class

en_quotes.quote: A broken bone can heal, but the wound a word opens can fester forever

en_quotes.quote: I believe anger is a wasted emotion, and I don't like to waste emotions

en_quotes.quote: I get really angry when I get hungry. If you don't feed me, I won't talk to you. That's when my anger issues come out

en_quotes.quote: It's nice to let some anger out sometimes
en_quotes.author: Bianca Andreescu

en_quotes.quote: The world needs anger. The world often continues to allow evil because it isn't angry enough
en_quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

en_quotes.quote: My anger is constructive
en_quotes.author: Beppe Grillo

en_quotes.quote: Mum had pumped me so full of anger, I couldn't throw it off

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of anger in 'Queen of Denmark,' and that's me getting political

en_quotes.quote: I just put my anger and resentment into basketball. Even the stuff from my childhood

en_quotes.quote: I like people and get along, and I'm afraid to express my anger and my rage

en_quotes.quote: A hungry man is an angry one
en_quotes.author: Buchi Emecheta

en_quotes.quote: The American people are smart. They've gotten sick of the predictable hyperpartisan talking points and canned anger
en_quotes.author: John Avlon

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the only true enemy, born of ignorance and the parent of anger and hate

en_quotes.quote: Americans are slow to anger, but once they do get angry, they are impossible to stop

en_quotes.quote: I don't have the feeling of being motivated by anger, revenge or frustration

en_quotes.quote: Now I've come to a place where I believe that anger doesn't really make me a better actor

en_quotes.quote: Anger is not an accepted thing for women. And, you know, I do get angry. I feel it's a very honest emotion

en_quotes.quote: Anger and hate against one we love steels our hearts, but contempt or pity leaves us silent and ashamed

en_quotes.quote: Some people can vent their anger, take a breath, and let it go, but I wasn't one of them

en_quotes.quote: Verbally, I'm quite fast on my feet. I could embarrass or anger most people if I wanted to

en_quotes.quote: What if you threw a protest and no one showed up? The lack of angst and anger and emotion is a big positive

en_quotes.quote: It's still unacceptable for women to have negative emotions, especially anger, and I was trying to write against that

en_quotes.quote: I have some anger issues

en_quotes.quote: Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you

en_quotes.quote: There's no anger in my act towards anyone other than myself... and maybe airlines

en_quotes.quote: You have to control your anger - you can't be a baby when you lose

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I've ever had a conversation with a comedian who stole except for when it's been in anger

en_quotes.quote: I want to understand the anger in the world

en_quotes.quote: Being an activist is about getting things done. It's not about standing around shaking your fist in anger

en_quotes.quote: Dying peacefully means to avoid any immediate cause for anger, fear, or strong desire

en_quotes.quote: I feel like we sometimes let our emotions and anger get in the way

en_quotes.quote: I think anger does fuel a successful acting career. To play the great roles, you have to learn how to blaze

en_quotes.quote: I think that all the anger and cynicism comes from suppressing things that we always wanted

en_quotes.quote: On stage, I find anger at the unfairness of the world easily

en_quotes.quote: Avoiding fear, sadness, or anger is not the same thing as being happy

en_quotes.quote: A certain amount of anger doesn't make us less empathetic, less humane, less loving. It just makes us real

en_quotes.quote: There never was a social change in America without angry people at the heart
en_quotes.author: Keith Miller

en_quotes.quote: Anger's not a good emotion
en_quotes.author: Lincoln Chafee

en_quotes.quote: The Anger Management Tour was another beautiful thing. I loved that tour

en_quotes.quote: Always write angry letters to your enemies. Never mail them

en_quotes.quote: I've purged myself of bitterness and anger and remained open to love

en_quotes.quote: The greatest players use anger as fuel. Michael Jordan played every night with something like road rage

en_quotes.quote: I was shocked at the anger toward me

en_quotes.quote: I may have been the only candidate in America who failed to ride the wave of anti-establishment anger to victory

en_quotes.quote: I think people should be angry at things that are worthy of anger. Injustice is outrageous and deserves outrage

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes with anger you can be much more dangerous than with skill

en_quotes.quote: Everybody in America is angry about something
en_quotes.author: Anthony Braxton

en_quotes.quote: It angers me that a timed, planned and paid smearing campaign is run against me in the press
en_quotes.author: Beny Steinmetz

en_quotes.quote: Fear generates anger, and fear generates violence, and those were part of what built the Saudi state
en_quotes.author: Robert Lacey

en_quotes.quote: I personally do not believe in politics, hatred, or anger in my musical composition
en_quotes.author: Horace Silver

en_quotes.quote: I know I should feel anger at my father for certain things. But since he died when I was 11, I never got to that point
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Kahn

en_quotes.quote: The anger and the brutality against everything can readily from one hour to the next be transformed into its opposite
en_quotes.author: Thomas Bernhard

en_quotes.quote: I think, often, when you are in just a lot of pain, it comes out as anger
en_quotes.author: Nell Hudson
